Welcome to EllipTrack's documentation!
======================================

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   getting_started
   parameters
   GUI
   execution
   outputs
   tutorial

This documentation is organized into the following sections.

*  :ref:`Getting_Started_Page`. System requirement. Input files. Installation. Preparatory steps.
*  :ref:`Parameters_Page`. Description of the algorithms and parameters.
*  :ref:`GUI_Page`. Tutorial for Parameter Generator GUI and Training Data Generator GUI.
*  :ref:`Execution_Page`. Procedure for running EllipTrack.
*  :ref:`Outputs_Page`. Description of the output files.
*  :ref:`Tutorial_Page`. Tutorial for tracking a sample movie.
